mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.`cateName` AS `cateName`, c.`typeName` AS `typeName` FROM `km_cs_faq` AS a LEFT JOIN `km_cs_cate` AS b ON a.`cate` = b.`cate` LEFT JOIN `km_cs_type` AS c ON a.`type` = c.`type` LIMIT #{start}, 10

SELECT a.*, b.`cateName` AS `cateName`, c.`typeName` AS `typeName` FROM `km_cs_faq` AS a LEFT JOIN `km_cs_cate` AS b ON a.`cate` = b.`cate` LEFT JOIN `km_cs_type` AS c ON a.`type` = c.`type` WHERE a.`faqNo` = #{faqNo}
SELECT a.cate, b.`typeName` FROM `km_cs_cate` AS a LEFT JOIN `km_cs_type` AS b ON a.`cate` = b.`cate`
